name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: They left in their wake utter destruction, but the one thing they could not destroy is the spirit of our people. We will rebuild after these storms just as we do after hurricanes and how we are battling the Coronavirus—together. (2/2)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: We saw more tragedy in the midst of what is already one of the most trying times our state has endured. We lost at least 9 precious lives across South Carolina last night to the tornadoes that swept through our state. (1/2) pic.twitter.com/35Q75TAedC

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Easter Sunday gives us the opportunity to reflect on the sacrifice made for us and to celebrate the precious blessing that is life. Stay home, stay safe, and make sure your loved ones know what they mean to you.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today @SCEMD received a generous donation of 100,000 N95 masks from @Apple They will be distributed to South Carolina's health care professionals and first responders. Thank you and welcome to #TeamSC

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:
I commend and thank every member of the House of

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:
There appears to be no tactic or action too deceitful or reckless for the leaders of Santee Cooper to employ. This includes exploiting the pandemic to maintain the status quo with today’s five-hour Senate filibuster.

(1/2)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Every day, our primary objective is to protect South Carolinians, but we also must act to protect the state’s economy. This order does both. name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:
All retail businesses remaining open must limit customers inside to no more than 5 customers per 1,000 square feet or 20% of maximum capacity, whichever is less. 

(3/)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:
The list of closed businesses remains the same: 

1. Entertainment venues and facilities
2. Recreational and athletic facilities and activities
3. Close-contact service providers
4. Non-essential retail stores 

Details and clarification request: 
 http://sccommerce.com  

(2/)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:

tweet:

tweet:

tweet:

tweet:

tweet: Today I am requesting all out of state visitors to South Carolina planning a stay of two or more nights self quarantine for two weeks immediately upon arrival.

tweet: It does not apply to private businesses nor to responsible South Carolinians continuing to make the best out of this situation. (4/)

tweet: Law enforcement asked for clarification as to how this existing law applies during this state of emergency. (2/)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:

tweet:

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: At this time, ordering South Carolinians to shelter in place is not under consideration. If we all work together, act responsibly, and take necessary precautions, lives can be saved now. https://twitter.com/henrymcmaster/status/1241126639775502337 …

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: The time is now for everyone to take this situation seriously and to follow the instructions of national and state officials. Voluntary action and precaution NOW will save the lives of many.  http://scdhec.gov  (2/2)

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Tonight, two more South Carolinians have succumbed to COVID-19.  Please join me in praying for their families and for their communities for their losses.  (1/2)

tweet:

tweet: As we commemorate the 75th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz, it is incumbent upon us to ensure that the events of the Holocaust not become distant nor the stories of the people who suffered its horrors be forgotten. pic.twitter.com/6kM3RNeXQW

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Last year we took a dramatic step by freezing college tuition for in-state students. I urge the General Assembly to do it again this year by providing a 5% funding increase for each institution that does not raise tuition. pic.twitter.com/88biNIAOZE

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: I ask that we invest at least $100 million dollars toward making our prisons safer and more secure, both inside and outside the fence, by replacing and repairing existing infrastructure, facilities and control systems.  https://governor.sc.gov/sites/default/files/Documents/Executive-Budget/FY21%20Executive%20Budget.pdf … pic.twitter.com/B8Off62ZhD

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet:

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: I ask that we dedicate at least $60 million in new dollars to law enforcement, public safety and first response agencies for recruitment and retention.  https://governor.sc.gov/sites/default/files/Documents/Executive-Budget/FY21%20Executive%20Budget.pdf … pic.twitter.com/wmkdTePwQT

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: More people are working in South Carolina than ever before, unemployment is at a record low, and personal income growth is the highest ever.  We are consistently rated as one of the best places in the country to live, work and raise a family. pic.twitter.com/bul0F0x85r

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Shame on us if we spend all of the $1.8 billion surplus and don't send any money back to the taxpayers. name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: This year, let us roar into the twenties with renewed purpose.  Let us be bold.  Let us act on behalf of the sons and daughters of South Carolina, so that they may receive a state as bright with promise as that which we were blessed to inherit. pic.twitter.com/TCWppzbW1h
